amendment.description: To commend the men and women of the Armed Forces of the United States in Iraq for their on-going service to the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4209 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6121) To commend the men and women of the Armed Forces of the United States in Iraq for their on-going service to the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4209 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
